name: riven
description: Riven is a self-hosted media automation platform similar to Sonarr/Radarr but built for managing music, movies, and TV libraries with customizable pipelines.

features.title: Media Library
features.description: Automatically download and organize movies, TV shows, and music

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Query multiple indexers and trackers simultaneously for content

features.title: Quality Profiles
features.description: Define preferred formats, resolutions, and codecs for downloads

features.title: Folder Organization
features.description: Automatically rename and sort media into structured folders

features.title: Download Monitoring
features.description: Track active downloads and manage queue priorities
